recordTypes.name: Special Events
recordTypes.description: Completing the Special Events On-Line Application will walk those interested in having events through the required approval process and is designed to make it easier by making it a one stop process for the applicant.  The application will be reviewed by all departments required to sign off on the approvals.  A complete application with accurate description of the event, required site plans other required documentation will ensure a seamless process.

recordTypes.name: Building, Zoning, Public Works Driveway and Fire Marshal Online Permits
recordTypes.description: Permits included but not limited to: Additions, New Construction, Pools, Decks, Sheds, Garages, Electrical, Plumbing, HVAC, Solar, Tanks, Piping, Gas and more.
